0.title: Multi-purpose cleaning wipes for all surfaces
0.description:
• An ideal product with easy and quick cleaning without hardness and pressure, for cleaning different surfaces and areas
  • Multi-purpose wipe with antibacterial properties and removes all kinds of stains, dirt, pollution, grease, bacteria, and dust.
  • Deep cleaner for all types of surfaces such as kitchen, car interior, workplace, bathroom, toilet, electric switch, tile, cabinet handle, etc.
  • Disinfecting and brightening household appliances such as sinks, faucets, refrigerators, furniture, tables, tablecloths, etc.
  • Quantity: 50 thick sheets
  • Size: 12 x 18 cm

1.title: Household cleaning wipes
1.description:
• Disinfectant wipes, Duffy cleaners for home appliances
  • Quick cleaner and brightener for surfaces and home appliances
  • Removing all kinds of grease stains from gas and kitchen surfaces
  • Removing grease stains and dirt from the table, sofa, etc.
  • Suitable for disinfecting office supplies: computer, phone,table, etc.
  • It has a new formulation and a pleasant scent
  • Quantity: 20 sheets
